extension.name: CComment - JomSocial features
extension.author: Compojoom
extension.description: This plugin allows you to use JomSocial's User Point and Activity Stream in compojoomComment

field.name: activityStreamNewComment
field.label: Activity Stream new comment
field.description: User activity such as adding new comment will be published in the user profile

field.name: activityStreamDeleteComment
field.label: Activity Stream delete comment
field.description: User activity such as deleting comment will be published in the user profile

field.name: activityStreamVoteComment
field.label: Activity Stream vote comment
field.description: User activity such as voting on a comment will be published in the user profile

field.name: userPointsOnComment
field.label: User Points new Comment
field.description: Select whether the user should receive points for new comment

field.name: userPointsOnVote
field.label: User Points on Vote
field.description: Select whether the user should receive points for voting on comment

field.name: userPointsOnCommentDelete
field.label: User Points on Vote
field.description: Select whether the user should receive points for voting on comment

field.name: commentLength
field.label: Comment length
field.description: Specify how long the comment should be.
